name: surface_radioactivity_content_of_140Ba
description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Ba" means the element "barium" and "140Ba" is the isotope "barium-140" with a half-life of 1.28e+01 days.
